Welcome to the Class Designs Webiste

Here is a Picture of the Class Designs T-shirt releasing very soon

This t-shirt has both advantages and disadvantages and some advantages to this t-shirt are that it is made with 100% cotton meaning it uses a breathable, comfortable and cost-effective fabric and can be used in many different environments. The T-shirt is also supplied in sizes from XS to XL, meaning that it is available to all customers who would like to buy the T-shirt. The t-shirt also sports a completely unique design on their front and back which uncorroborated the class design logo acting as a passive advertising method and uses a style and fit that was found to be more popular than others in my target age group according to our past market research.

We hope you will enjoy our products for years to come!
